a69d1554-3f44-4dc6-a234-e37fd25c4569.description: For successfully completing the Applying the QM Rubric workshop
a69d1554-3f44-4dc6-a234-e37fd25c4569.name: Applying the QM Rubric

badge_template_activities.title: The earner applied the QM Higher Education Rubric, Sixth Edition, to a real course, completed an interactive study guide on objectives and an alignment worksheet, and drafted helpful recommendations.

6eb360ee-46f4-4021-aab4-ae1022a16942.description: For successfully completing the Applying the QM Rubric workshop
6eb360ee-46f4-4021-aab4-ae1022a16942.name: Applying the QM Rubric

badge_template_activities.title: The earner applied the QM Higher Education Rubric, Fifth Edition, to a real course, completed an interactive study guide on objectives and an alignment worksheet, and drafted helpful recommendations.

d3e40eb6-8d55-41e5-8e39-8bd613386a42.description: The earner of this digital credential is able to evaluate online courses and determine how to rectify any deficiencies through teaching. Earners have evaluated the instructional design of an online course, identifying strengths and needed improvements including how those strengths and areas for improvement impact their teaching.
d3e40eb6-8d55-41e5-8e39-8bd613386a42.name: Evaluation of Course Design

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Evaluating Your Course Design workshop.
Submit an evaluation of an online course using the QM Rubric, along with a plan to rectify any deficiencies through online teaching.

9c0d88cc-9f31-44b5-9631-a9d0ca5805dd.description: The earner of this digital credential has an understanding of the technology skills required to teach effectively online. The earner possesses self-knowledge in terms of technology skills and deficiencies and is able to plan to address any shortcomings related to technology skills.
9c0d88cc-9f31-44b5-9631-a9d0ca5805dd.name: Technology Skills Self-Assessment

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Gauging Your Technology Skills workshop.
Identify technology skill improvement opportunities for online teaching and how you might rectify those skill deficiencies.

a36ab83c-9549-4997-8a87-4c5cc7060fdb.description: The earner of this digital credential knows how to create instructor, social, and cognitive presence in the online classroom. Earners are able to describe how to create these three different types of presence in online courses.
a36ab83c-9549-4997-8a87-4c5cc7060fdb.name: Creating Presence

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Creating Presence in Your Online Course workshop.
Describe how to create instructor, social, and cognitive presence in online courses.

c955c02b-9ec2-469a-b990-3ee78298f45a.description: The earner of this digital credential is able to explain why orienting online learners is an important part of effectively teaching online. The earner can explain why it is important to orient learners in online learning and can identify what is needed in a course orientation.
c955c02b-9ec2-469a-b990-3ee78298f45a.name: Orienting Learners

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Orienting Your Online Learners workshop.
Explain why and how to orient learners to online learning and to online courses.

68b0b073-c1f0-4e57-9ba3-e98688f97089.description: For becoming a QM-Certified Higher Education Peer Reviewer
68b0b073-c1f0-4e57-9ba3-e98688f97089.name: QM-Certified Higher Education Peer Reviewer

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of the QM-Certified Higher Education Peer Reviewer digital credential has completed the QM professional development pathway to become a QM-Certified Peer Reviewer and has qualified to serve in this role because they have online teaching experience within the last 18 months in a college-credit-bearing course. The earner has completed the QM role application to be entered into the QM Peer Reviewer database and may be asked to participate in official QM Course Reviews for certification.

61776972-9bdd-4e40-9179-f9a82db3ee54.description: The earner of this digital credential has an understanding of the pedagogical and andragogical learning theories that underpin online learning. The earner can also identify methods of motivation for online learners. Earners are able to describe different learning theories and how they relate to their teaching practice.
61776972-9bdd-4e40-9179-f9a82db3ee54.name: Connecting Learning Theories to Teaching Strategies

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Connecting Learning Theories to Your Teaching Strategies workshop.
Describe an online course based on each of the learning theories covered in the workshop and described different ways to motivate learners.

2c5169b8-fa07-444c-abf0-18fe9c7a8f2f.description: The earner of this digital credential can articulate different ways to measure the success of the teaching and learning process in online courses. Earners are able to explain how to address academic integrity, monitor learner progress, develop and use rubrics for assessment, assess group work, and assess teaching.
2c5169b8-fa07-444c-abf0-18fe9c7a8f2f.name: Learner Assessment

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Assessing Your Online Learners workshop.
Explain how to integrate academic integrity, track learner progress, use rubrics, and assess group work, and how to assess teaching online.

51156853-e93a-431c-8210-ab506057cbea.description: The earner of this digital credential can articulate how institutional policies are important for all instructors to know when teaching online. Earners have demonstrated their ability to locate institutional policies and describe how they will impact their teaching practice.
51156853-e93a-431c-8210-ab506057cbea.name: Policy Awareness

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Exploring Your Institution's Policies workshop.
Create a list of institution policies related to online teaching and who to contact and what to do to implement and enforce those policies.

cab8c00a-185a-4adc-af51-2c3b3dcb591a.description: For successfully completing the QM Higher Education Peer Reviewer Course
cab8c00a-185a-4adc-af51-2c3b3dcb591a.name: Peer Reviewer Course

badge_template_activities.title: The earner demonstrated the ability to write helpful recommendations and completed a practice course review applying QM Rubric, Sixth Edition, Specific Review Standards correctly to a real online course.

bdc587ea-bbf7-4bd7-87ea-aa19394e4bb6.description: The earner of this digital credential has demonstrated knowledge competence in seven different competencies related to online teaching. The QM Teaching Online Certificate represents the earner's knowledge of crucial online teaching competencies evidenced in the seven individual credentials earned under this certificate.
bdc587ea-bbf7-4bd7-87ea-aa19394e4bb6.name: QM Teaching Online Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the seven QM Teaching Online Certificate digital credentials in any order, backed with evidence. Together, the evidence from these credentials represent the earner’s mastery of these online teaching competencies.
Technology Skills Self-Assessment
Evaluation of Course Design
Policy Awareness
Orienting Learners
Connecting Learning Theories to Teaching Strategies
Creating Presence
Learner Assessment

ff7aa761-b747-4e36-8b18-ec408e76549f.description: Evaluated one's own online course using the QM Essential Specific Review Standards and created a plan for course improvements.
ff7aa761-b747-4e36-8b18-ec408e76549f.name: Improving Your Online Course

badge_template_activities.title: The earner completed a QM Self Review of their own course using the QM Essential Specific Review Standards, Sixth Edition, that are required to be met in an official QM Course Review for QM certification. The earner also completed a Course Improvement Plan for their course including timelines and priorities for improvement.

ba684279-0a7e-45a4-a645-7cb7e9360b48.description: For successfully completing the Designing Your Online Course workshop
ba684279-0a7e-45a4-a645-7cb7e9360b48.name: Designing Your Online Course

badge_template_activities.title: Created a course plan for one module of an online course using the QM Essential Specific Review Standards, Sixth Edition.

2c5f3117-0147-4aec-9fad-6d39e79142ea.description: For successfully completing the QM Higher Education Peer Reviewer Course
2c5f3117-0147-4aec-9fad-6d39e79142ea.name: Peer Reviewer Course

badge_template_activities.title: The earner demonstrated the ability to write helpful recommendations and completed a practice course review applying QM Rubric, Fifth Edition, Specific Review Standards correctly to a real online course.

af37094c-f400-4649-92da-10cd14740ebe.description: Evaluated one's own online course using the QM Essential Specific Review Standards and created a plan for course improvements.
af37094c-f400-4649-92da-10cd14740ebe.name: Improving Your Online Course

badge_template_activities.title: The earner completed a QM Self Review of their own course using the QM Essential Specific Review Standards, Fifth Edition, that are required to be met in an official QM Course Review for QM certification. The earner also completed a Course Improvement Plan for their course including timelines and priorities for improvement.

d35e6f58-f423-4663-ae4c-b420e48553c9.description: For becoming a QM-Certified Higher Education Master Reviewer
d35e6f58-f423-4663-ae4c-b420e48553c9.name: QM-Certified Higher Education Master Reviewer

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of the QM-Certified Higher Education Master Reviewer digital credential has completed the QM professional development pathway to become a QM-Certified Master Reviewer and has qualified to serve in this role because they have online teaching experience within the last 18 months in a college-credit-bearing course and have completed at least two QM-Certified Course Reviews.
The earner has completed the QM role application to be entered into the QM Peer Reviewer database and may be asked to participate in or lead official QM Course Reviews for certification.

8bae3dd1-ec33-437b-aee3-b23db36d7ee9.description: For becoming a QM-Certified K-12 Course Reviewer
8bae3dd1-ec33-437b-aee3-b23db36d7ee9.name: QM-Certified K-12 Course Reviewer

The earner has completed the QM role application to be entered into the QM K-12 Course Reviewer database and may be asked to participate in official QM Course Reviews for certification.

5b7d0e1b-553d-4a44-9e21-924bd1dc76d8.description: For becoming a QM-Certified K-12 Course Reviewer
5b7d0e1b-553d-4a44-9e21-924bd1dc76d8.name: QM-Certified K-12 Course Reviewer

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of the QM-Certified K-12 Course Reviewer digital credential has completed the QM professional development pathway to become a QM-Certified K-12 Course Reviewer and has qualified to serve in this role because they have online teaching or online course development experience within the last 18 months in a K-12 course.
The earner has completed the QM role application to be entered into the QM K-12 Course Reviewer database and may be asked to participate in official QM Course Reviews for certification.

68a9ef39-aa17-4761-b981-136ce73a2e32.name: Applying the QM Rubric

e55b7b7b-77aa-46f1-ae10-78eed72ea2b3.name: QM-Certified Course Review Manager
